messages.message: That daughter of mine spent all of my hard earned gold buying a million pairs of shoes!
I may have to do the unthinkable and sell the Krusty Krab!
The Krusty Krab and the Krabby Patty formula to that low down dirty cur plankton. *spits*
Unless you happen to have some money tucked away somewhere?
Well, there is the lost treasure of Dead Eye Gulch!
It belonged to your ancestor, William Krabs who owned the Krusty Kantina,
back when Bikini Bottom was called Dead Eye Gulch.
He was forced to hand it over to the outlaw, Dead Eye Plankton, but
Dead Eye Plankton was thrown in jail before William Krabs could ever retrieve it.
Mr Krabs! I can help you! Bikini Bottom needs the Krusty Krab!
Let's use William Krabs' journal to find the treasure.
There are pieces missing, but we'll figure it out.
Hahaha! My plan went off without a hitch!
I knew tricking that simpleton Pearl would work.
Soon the Krusty Krab, the Krabby Patty Recipe and the treasure will all be mine!
